reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the improvement of the maritime arbitration service in Fujian Free Trade Zone, China

description.narrative: The project is designed to support the Fujian Free Trade Zone (FTZ) to issue policy, by the end of 2017, to release market access barriers for international companies in the field of commercial maritime legal service through the successful development of a new pilot in maritime arbitration policy and services. UK experience and best practice will be drawn upon to improve the capacity of Chinese stakeholders in the field of commercial maritime legal services, facilitating market access for international companies, including UK businesses, into the Fujian FTZ maritime legal services industry.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
